# vfs_context_pid

**Function**

Get the process id of the BSD process associated with a vfs_context_t.

## Declaration

```swift
int vfs_context_pid(vfs_context_t ctx);
```

## Parameters

- **ctx**: Context whose associated process to find.

## Return Value

Process id.
title: vfs_context_pid
